com.indragie.cmput301as1

Interface ListSection.ViewConfigurator<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommentViewConfigurator, DestinationViewConfigurator, ExpenseItemViewConfigurator, TagViewConfigurator, XMLSectionHeaderConfigurator
    Enclosing class:
    ListSection<T>

    public static interface ListSection.ViewConfigurator<T>
    An object that creates and configures views for display in a ListView using model objects contained within the section.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configureView(Context context, View view, T object)
      Configures a view for display using a model.
      View createView(Context context, ViewGroup parent)
      Creates a new view.
      int getViewTypeCode()
      Type code for the view used to display items from the section.

    • Method Detail

      • getViewTypeCode

        int getViewTypeCode()
        Type code for the view used to display items from the section. Sections that use the same view should return the same type code.
        Returns:
        View type code.

      • createView

        View createView(Context context,
                ViewGroup parent)
        Creates a new view.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        parent - The parent view that the created view will be attached to.
        Returns:
        A new view for displaying an item from the section, e.g. by inflating from XML.

      • configureView

        void configureView(Context context,
                   View view,
                   T object)
        Configures a view for display using a model.
        Parameters:
        context - The current context.
        view - The view to configure.
        object - The model object to get data from.
